title: Drawing, "Female Head, Right Profile, in Headdress and Earrings"
description: The profile, in dark outline, depicts a high forehead; long nose turned upward at the tip; full, closed lips; and rounded chin. The eyelid and empty eye socket are also depicted in outline. A curved line framing the face on the left serves as one edge of a headdress, limited here to a border, in a scrolling pattern. Long, dangling, three-tiered earrings in a geometric pattern extend to the lower edge of the neck, where they stop short of the curved, patterned necklace (or neckline).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Female Head, Right Profile, in Headdress and Earrings".
19.5 x 13.3 cm (7 3/4 x 5 1/4 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-130.
